value.title: Deep-learning system explores materials' interiors from the outside

value.title: Machine learning helps scientists identify the environmental preferences of microbes
value.excerpt: A machine-learning approach can give scientists insight into the environmental preferences of microbes, based only on their genes. The approach has practical research implications: it could help researchers more efficiently grow bacteria in the laboratory.

value.title: How To Avoid Bias In Machine Learning Algorithms
value.excerpt: ML algorithms are great helpers that are applicable to numerous industries. However, since the technology is relatively new, many aspects—including biased output—need special attention and improvement.
